instructions.step_2: Copy the 'anon public' key and replace YOUR_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY_HERE
instructions.step_3: Copy the 'service_role' key and replace YOUR_SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY_HERE
instructions.step_4: Go to SQL Editor and run the schema from database/supabase_schema.sql
instructions.step_5: Update schema_created to true after running the SQL
